p: The essential oil obtained from the resin of Alm√©cega has been proven to have anti-inflammatory, antitumor, antioxidant, antimicrobial, and cytotoxic actions against Artemia salina [ 15]. In this context, P. heptaphyllum has become a potential ally, since many pharmacological studies have shown its positive effects in the treatment of various diseases coupled with the fact that there are no studies that prove the action of this essential oil from P. heptaphyllum (EOPh) in contraction of vascular smooth muscle.
